name: OpticDiscExamForStructuralAbnormalities
title: Optic Disc Exam for Structural Abnormalities
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of diagnostic studies specific to assessing for structural abnormalities of the optic disc by ophthalmoscopy.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnostic Study.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnostic study using ophthalmoscopy.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
